milestones.description: This is the highest match aggregate (531) involving teams England & West Indies in ODIs
Graham Gooch has scored 28 fifty-plus scores in ODIs, the most for ENG breaking Allan Lamb's record
Viv Richards has scored 56 fifty-plus scores in ODIs, the most for WI breaking Haynes's record
Viv Richards has scored 56 fifty-plus scores in ODIs, breaking Haynes's record
